tokens.text: ignores the cannot_be_attacked component on targets

generated_doNotEdit.title: Ignore Cannot Be Attacked
generated_doNotEdit.description: When set, blocks entities from attacking the owner entity unless they have the "minecraft:ignore_cannot_be_attacked" component.

fields.title: Filters
fields.description: Defines which entities are exceptions and are allowed to be attacked by the owner entity, potentially attacked entity is subject "other". If this is not specified then all attacks by the owner are allowed.
